titles: Ayres to sing and play to the lute and basse-violl. VVith pauins, galliards, almaines, and corantos for the lyra violl. By William Corkine.
author: Corkine, William, fl. 1610-1612.
publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard in Fleete-streete,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Songs with instrumental ensemble --  Early works to 1800.
